thread.title: Citizens Bank Becomes An Unlikely Student Loan Leader
thread.title_full: Citizens Bank Becomes An Unlikely Student Loan Leader

title: Citizens Bank Becomes An Unlikely Student Loan Leader
text:
Popular Posts Full Bio 
I spent my career in consumer banking, working for Citibank and Barclays. I helped bring credit cards to Russia, expand banking in Mexico and ultimately ran the largest credit card company in the UK. I believe that basic banking and borrowing has become too complicated and too expensive. And I believe that technology is poised to change everything, empowering people with information, choice and dramatically better value. I left banking to create MagnifyMoney.com, a price comparison website that makes it easy to find the cheapest way to borrow and the most rewarding way to save. Not surprisingly, the best deals are coming from unfamiliar names. I will be writing about new and innovative ways to save money. I will be shining a spotlight on companies truly making a difference. And I wonâ€™t be afraid to call out big banks up to their old tricks. The author is a Forbes contributor. The opinions expressed are those of the writer. Loading...
